contentList.content: On a hit, mark your target with light, preventing it from turning <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the affected entity have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

On a hit, mark your target with light, preventing it from turning <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the affected entity have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

On a hit, mark your target with light, preventing it from turning <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the affected entity have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

The affected entity sheds light in a [1] radius, preventing it from becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the affected entity have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
